doc:
Beverly D'Angelo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beverly_D%27Angelo 0 Beverly Heather D'Angelo (born November 15, 1951) is an American actress and singer, who starred as Ellen Griswold in the National Lampoon's Vacation films (1983–2015). She has appeared in over 60 films and was nominated for a Golden Globe Award for her role as Patsy Cline in Coal Miner's Daughter (1980), and for an Emmy Award for her role as Stella Kowalski in the TV film A Streetcar Named Desire (1984). Her other film roles include Sheila Franklin in Hair (1979) and Doris Vinyard in American History X (1998). Beverly_Heather_D'Angelo ( born November_15_,_1951 ) is an_American_actress_and_singer , who starred as Ellen_Griswold in the_National_Lampoon 's_Vacation_films ( 1983 – 2015 ) . She has_appeared in over_60_films and was_nominated for a_Golden_Globe_Award for her_role as Patsy_Cline in Coal_Miner 's_Daughter_(_1980_) , and for an_Emmy_Award for her_role as Stella_Kowalski in the_TV_film A_Streetcar Named Desire_(_1984_) . Her_other_film_roles include Sheila_Franklin in Hair_(_1979_)_and_Doris_Vinyard in American_History_X ( 1998_) .
